name: Prison Break Zombies
description:
Stop the zombie prisoners from escaping!

The prisons all over the country has been infected. Find patient zero and...then do the same in the second loop.

Prison Break Zombies is a shmup, heavily based on Space Invaders.

Collect stars to boost your score and buy the 2X Scoring Amulet, with the coins that the zombies drop, to boost the score faster.
